attributes.title: YIKES!
attributes.review:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue.
YIKES!!!! Don’t get this app!!!
No... just no... like this app drains your battery in seconds... literally seconds. Like BAM! It was empty. It also glitches and I have to restart my phone to get out of the app.
I believe the app is like its maker... a failure.

attributes.title: This app is bad!!!
attributes.review: It called me names nd stuff and i think i caught corona from it since it didnt give out any tyoe of mask!!!! I am furious about this i hate it it took me weeks to download and when it finnaly downloaded it called me a kung-flu

attributes.title: This app stinks!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to see what our great and wonderful and scrumptious and delicious tangy orange of a president Donald J Trump was brewing up, and when I opened the app, it literally smelled like a rotten orange had been sitting out to ferment and make prison wine!!!

attributes.title: Trash throw it out!!
attributes.review: It took me a few weeks to download!! After I opened it up it got even worse, the app started to glitch. It kicked me out and I couldn’t get back in.

attributes.title: This app is horrible 🤢🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded it to show support for president cheeto puff👨‍🦰but the app kept buffering 😤and I have no time for an app that doesn’t even work 🙄never downloading it again🖕

attributes.title: 🥰🧚‍♀️🤮✨
attributes.review: Tragedy struck😔I tried to find the courage💜to even open the app🥰 But the moment it started🎂to download🥳 I threw my 💖phone across✨the room😣 and suddenly it paused the download😝and deleted❌the app😇 so then 😎 I wrote my review 😘

attributes.title: Deleting it now
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used. It glitches like crazy and a 🍊 keeps popping up and I’m just tired of it. Don’t get this app. I can’t even tell you how bad it is.

attributes.title: No thank you!
attributes.review: This app is one of the worst I’ve ever seen! Constantly crashes and the ads never end!! Don’t even try to fix this, simply delete it.

attributes.title: They should take this off
attributes.review: This app is so bad because all it does is send you notifications I went to sleep but couldn’t because this stupid app

I downloaded this app for no reason to be honest, but what really ticked me off was the SLOWNESS of this app. My phone keeps running EXTREMELY slow, and this app was the cause. I should've KNOWN that when it took forever to download🙄. NOW I have to GO OUT OF MY WAY to get a BRAND NEW PHONE. THANKS A LOT ORANGE MAN😒. Thanks for coming to my talkshow y'all!! Have a great rest of your day😘😘. 

❌🍊❌🍊❌🍊❌🍊...🔪🍊 wait oops wrong emojis...❌🍊❌🍊
Anyone but Trump 2020
